history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00247
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING A SYSTEM OF FOOD DISTRIBUTION FOR ADDRESSING THE NUTRITIONAL NEEDS OF THE PEOPLE PROVIDING FOR ITS PROCUREMENT PROCESS AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BORDADO, GABRIEL H.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Bag-ao (012 2016-08-17)2. Batocabe (061 2017-01-24)
3. Dalipe (000 2017-10-12)4. Villarica (000 2018-07-16)
5. Acosta-Alba (000 2018-07-25)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-02-22
          -Initial Consideration with the following measures - HB numbers 767, 3419 and 3937
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2017-04-06
          -similar measures considered - HBs 767, 3419 and 3937
      3. Deliberated by the TWG on 2017-04-18
          -2nd TWG meeting - with HBs 767, 3419 and 3937
      4. Deliberated by the TWG on 2017-04-19
          -3rd TWG - HBs 767, 3419 and 3937
      5. Deliberated by the TWG on 2017-05-30
          -4th TWG - HBs 767, 3419 and 3937
      6. Measure approved by the Committee on 2017-10-10
          -The Committee approved the substitute bill for the following measures on the National Feeding Program, subject to amendments: HB 247 HB 767 HB 3419 HB 3937 The Secretariat was directed to file the Committee reports on the said substitute bills on Urban Agriculture and the National Feeding Program.
          -Approved the substitute bill on the national feeding program
      7. Measure approved by the Committee on 2018-03-13
          -substituted the previously approved substitute bill because of the approval of a similar national feeding program bill filed by the Committee on Basic Education
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON FOOD SECURITY ON 2016-07-26
